Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
bagel \ba"gel\ (b[=a]"g'l), n. [Yiddish beygl, prob. fr. dial. G. Beugel. --RHUD] a glazed leavened doughnut-shaped roll with a hard crust.
Note: A similar roll in Russia is called a bublik. [WordNet 1.5 +PJC]

Dictionary.Name: Virtual Entity of Relevant Acronyms (Version 1.9, June 2002)

Definition.WordDefinition: BAGEL Bay Area GNU Enthusiasts League (GNU, org., user group)
bagel n : (Yiddish) glazed yeast-raised doughnut-shaped roll with hard crust [syn: {beigel}]
